thread.section_title: Hotel Duret - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant location
thread.title_full: Brilliant location - Review of Hotel Duret, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: linda L
title: Brilliant location
text: This hotel was an excellent choice! Room was small but modern and clean with balcony onto the street. Great location and lovely staff on reception and for breakfast. It was close to the Arc de Triomphe with plenty of bars and cafes close by. Brilliant restaurant next door taking orders until 10pm.l would strongly recommend this hotel and I will definitely be coming back.
